bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of uncontrolled trembling of hands and feet. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 37: 四肢顫掉，若有失 而悸 , “The four limbs tremble as if one were greatly agitated because of a loss”. Chan fu pao sun 產婦脬損 , damage to a delivering woman’s bladder [2]

Alternative Names chan shi shang pao 產時傷脬 , bladder damage at the time of birth; sheng chan sun pao 生 產損脬 , bladder damaged during delivery. Pathological Condition with a woman in the course of giving birth having her urinary tract or bladder injured with the result of dribbling urine. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry juan 絹 quotes Fu ren da quan liang Gynecological book. Southern Song fang era, 1237. 婦人大全良方 : 婦人臨產時傷手胞破，小便不禁 , “When a woman has the bladder broken by a [midwife’s] hand at the time of delivery, her urine will flow unimpeded”, writes: 產婦脬損：小便淋瀝不斷 , “A delivering woman’s bladder damage : urine drips ceaselessly”.
